option.name: originalContent
option.value:
name: spotless-check.yml on: push: branches: ["main", "master"] pull_request: branches: ["main", "master"]
jobs: spotless: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - name: Checkout code uses: actions/checkout@v4 - name: Set up JDK 21 uses: actions/setup-java@v4 with: distribution: 'temurin' java-version: '21' - name: Cache Gradle packages uses: actions/cache@v4 with: path: ~/.gradle/caches key: ${{ runner.os }}-gradle-${{ hashFiles('**/*.gradle*', '**/gradle-wrapper.properties') }} restore-keys: | ${{ runner.os }}-gradle- - name: Run Spotless Check run: ./gradlew spotlessCheck

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
name: spotless-check.yml on: push: branches: ["main", "master"] pull_request: branches: ["main", "master"]
jobs: spotless: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - name: Checkout code uses: actions/checkout@v4 - name: Set up JDK 21 uses: actions/setup-java@v4 with: distribution: 'temurin' java-version: '21' - name: Cache Gradle packages uses: actions/cache@v4 with: path: ~/.gradle/caches key: ${{ runner.os }}-gradle-${{ hashFiles('**/*.gradle*', '**/gradle-wrapper.properties') }} restore-keys: | ${{ runner.os }}-gradle- - name: Run Spotless Check run: ./gradlew spotlessCheck
